attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient

attributes.description:
If you are reading this, it means you are now where you are supposed to be. You have worked hard and endlessly to find yourself in a position to buy your next vehicle. For most, buying a car is the most expensive purchase ever, so do it at a dealership you can trust and give you sound advice. At Mossel Bay VW, we are more than selling cars. We pride ourselves in giving our best for customer satisfaction and believe in building lifelong friendships and long-term business.

We do nation-wide deliveries and use several finance houses to ensure that you get the best deal.
	
Feel free to contact any of our well-trained sales professionals to assist you with your next purchase
Geeno Du Plessis 
Stuart Pypers 
Damiane Scott

Please feel free to contact us for any more info.
